title: The Mirror Stage as Formative of the Function of the I as Revealed in Psychoanalytic Experience
The Mirror Stage as Formative of the Function of the I Function, as Revealed in Psychoanalytic Experience
The Mirror Stage as Formative of the Function of the I Function
Le stade du miroir comme formateur de la fonction du je, telle qu’elle nous est révélée, dans l’expérience psychanalytique
